11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abdullah bin Abi Qatadah that his father said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite the Umm Al-Quran and two surahs in the first two rak'ahs of Zuhr and 'Asr, and in the last two with Umm Al-Quran, and he would make us hear a verse sometimes, and he used to make the first rak'ah lengthy

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ الأُولَيَيْنِ مِنْ صَلاَةِ الظُّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Recitation in the first two rak'ahs on Zuhr
